code: import React,{useState}from'react';import TodoView from'./TodoView';import{TodoModel}from'../models/TodoModel';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function TodoController(){const[model]=useState(new TodoModel());const[items,setItems]=useState(model.getTasks());const addItem=item=>{model.addTask(item);setItems([...model.getTasks()]);};const delItem=()=>{model.removeTask();setItems([...model.getTasks()]);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TodoView,{items:items,onAddItem:addItem,onDelItem:delItem});};
